entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:04 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:04 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 12 in low lying inland areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8 except minus 12 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:04 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
